mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FAQ ORDER BY no DESC OFFSET (#{currPage} - 1) * #{amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (title, answer, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{answer}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE FAQ SET title = #{title}, answer = #{answer}, writer = #{writer}, update_date = current_date WHERE no = #{no}
